## Who is this app for?
This app is designed for university students participating in a class experiment. It’s a helpful tool to guide you through the scientific process, from forming a hypothesis to analysing your data and interpreting the results. Whether you’re new to experimental methods or looking to strengthen your skills, this app will provide you with a structured approach and valuable insights into the research process.

## How to use this app
Navigate through each section of the app to stay on track with the experiment. You’ll start by reviewing the background materials and submitting your hypothesis. Follow the prompts in each session to contribute to the class protocol, enter your measurements, and analyse your results. As you progress, you’ll gain hands-on experience with R and data analysis, ultimately building the skills to complete a well-rounded scientific report.
